mapper.select: SELECT sche_code FROM class WHERE class_code = #{class_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class( class_code, aca_code, class_name, class_subject, class_fee, sche_code ) VALUES ( #{class_code}, #{aca_code}, #{class_name}, #{class_subject}, #{class_fee}, #{sche_code} )
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET aca_code = #{aca_code}, class_name = #{class_name}, class_subject = #{class_subject}, class_fee = #{class_fee}, sche_code = #{sche_code} WHERE class_code = #{class_code}
